arm_group.description: Women in labor undergoing anesthesia care

brief_summary.textblock:
A national survey of current practices, preferred drug and technique choices for obstetric
      anesthesia and analgesia in Czech Republic.

clinical_study.brief_title: Obstetric Anesthesia and Analgesia Month Attributes in Czech Republic

detailed_description.textblock:
A one  month-long project monitoring an obstetric anesthesia practices in
      obstetric/anesthesia departments throughout the Czech Republic.

      Electronic Case Report Form (eCRF) is used to collect data on all obstetric anesthesia
      procedures in peripartal period and obstetric and anesthesia complications. All consecutive
      cases in each participating center during the study period are recorded. Each record is
      related to parturient and contains the following sections: history, form of labour
      analgesia, type of anesthesia for Cesarean section and anesthesia in third stage of labor.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        Women in labor undergoing anesthesia care

intervention.description: All anesthesia procedures during labor: labor analgesia, anesthesia for Cesarean section, anesthesia for procedures in third stage of labor

clinical_study.official_title: A National Survey on Obstetric Anesthesia and Analgesia Care in Czech Republic

primary_outcome.description: Monitoring of all obstetric anesthesia procedures in peripartal period and anesthesia complications: history, form of labour analgesia, type of anesthesia for Cesarean section and anesthesia in third stage of labor.
primary_outcome.measure: A national survey of current practice of obstetric anesthesia and analgesia in Czech Republic
primary_outcome.time_frame: Parturition period, up to 24 hours after labor

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
